trends: There have been no other sightings in Williamson
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: oval very large ,very shining stainless steel looking
divs: Sighting Detailsit was Friday around 12 noon , i was on my deck throwing a tennis ball out into my back yard,to my jack Russel to get her daily work out, i do this every day, the sky was clear no clouds very blue color, i was on my 4 or 5 throw , i spotted a object in the sky the object was really good distance from me but it was large, very large-i worked for a major airlines for 34 yrs in Atlanta GA, i have seen a ton of aircraft in the sky, in all kinds of weather conditions,from the sky and on the ground, this object was just there not moving,i set down in my chair and watch it for about 4 Min's-it finally move off to the left at a high rate of speed,about 5 miles or so then stop,i thought no airplane can do that,so i step in side my house and grab my binoculars,i wanted to see some wings or something on it,,i had to lay the binoculars against the collum on my deck to be able to hold them still enough to get a good still look at it.i sighted it in and focuses my lens,,,,this was not an airplane,balloon,or anything like that,,i have seen to many aircraft ,and balloons in the sky---it was very shiny like stainless steel,it would move to side to side then up and down,it moved toward my house then stop,,at that time i saw a government aircraft come into sight ,i looked back to see what the object was doing and it was just like someone turn a light switch off,it was there for maybe 2 Min's then it was gone,,,the hold thing lasted about 8 Min's,,my house is one of the approach routs into Atlanta airport i see a ton of aircraft every day but nothing like this. ***also i had a ufo fly over my car comeing from a drive-in-movie back in 1967 a long dark hwy,it scared my date so bad that she never went out there again,,,and i just wrote it off as a ufo--but now iam re thinking that whole night----what did we see ???---
